supremacy_preemption.label: Supremacy & Federal Preemption
supremacy_preemption.description: State law or practice conflicts with, obstructs, or is displaced by federal law under the Supremacy Clause.

ultra_vires.label: Ultra Vires / Beyond Delegated Power
ultra_vires.description: The state is acting beyond the powers granted by statute or constitutional structure.

void_ab_initio.label: Void ab Initio
void_ab_initio.description: The measure is invalid from the outset because it contradicts constitutional text or structure.

rights_without_remedy.label: Rights Without Remedy
rights_without_remedy.description: Rights are acknowledged in theory, but the enforcement scheme denies a practical remedy.

police_power_overreach.label: Police Power Overreach
police_power_overreach.description: State actors invoke 'police powers' to justify control beyond the Tenth Amendment's limits.

commercial_fiction.label: Commercial Fiction
commercial_fiction.description: Private, non-commercial conduct is treated as commercial in order to import regulatory frameworks.

false_claims_risk.label: False Claims / Funding Misalignment
false_claims_risk.description: Practices raise concern that funding certifications are misleading or false.
